title: splitting up results - More Results does not work
description:
Your code to split results up into parts (like 50 per page) doesn't work 
properly. When I click More Results I get a null pointer exception.

comments.content:
This doesn't look like a real bug report.  If I am misunderstanding something,
please reopen and provide more information, prefrably attaching a self-enclosed
unit test that describes the problem.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
